dialog: I simply cannot seem to find the words to broach the topic. Very well, she has the right to know, after all.
Have you ever received a summons from the Ministry of Magic for an illegal park?
I've never had the misfortune. And you, have you?
Alas, I received one just yesterday.
Truly? For what reason?
I dared to park in a restricted zone.
Why did you take such a risk?
I had to attend to a pressing matter with haste.
Where did you park your broomstick?
At my wizarding dwelling, of course.
Do you not have a designated parking space of your own?
Time was of the essence, you see.
That was quite careless of you.
How may I assist you?
I am having a bit of a predicament.
What sort of predicament are you facing?
There have been strange charges made to my Gringotts debit card that I did not authorize.
Do you have your bank statement at hand?
Here it is, as requested.
To which charges are you referring?
